Overview

Why buy Realme 8 5G

 

  • Octa-Core MediaTek Dimensity 700 5G Processor lets you install and run multiple apps
  • 4GB RAM ensures efficient performance
  • Triple Rear Camera with a single front camera takes clear pictures
  • 18 Watts Quick Charge Support helps you to charge up your phone quickly
  • 128GB Storage helps you to store your files easily

 

Is your phone lagging behind in terms of speed and performance? Then wait no more! Buy Realme 8 online, which offers reliable performance with its stunning display, brilliant camera, and powerful processor. It is available in attractive colours which you will love. The phone is easy to hold and is crafted with a super slim body for perfect grip giving a stylish look. It has an Octa-Core MediaTek Dimensity 700 5G Processor with ARM Mali-G57 GPU, which helps you to play high-end games or run heavy files and carry out tasks without worrying about the performance. The upgraded CPU ensures a seamless response time, allowing you to multitask, play games or run any heavy task without worrying about the operation speed. With 4GB RAM, you can install more applications and run them all together without disturbing the speed of the phone. It supports 2 Nano SIM cards and 1 MicroSD card simultaneously and supports a maximum of 1TB memory expansion.

 

Loaded with so many specifications, the Realme 8 5G’s price makes it a better choice over other smartphones of this range. This smartphone runs on realme UI 2.0 based on the Android 11 Operating System. It comes with sensors like Side fingerprint sensor, Magnetic induction sensor, Light sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyro-meter, Acceleration sensor. The smartphone features a striking screen that gives you a 6.5-inch FHD Plus Large Fullscreen Display. The resolution is 1080 × 2400 pixels. With a 90 Hz High Refresh Rate, it ensures smooth clarity defining every detail. Its 5000 mAh Lithium-Ion battery is useful for continuous working as long as you don’t give up because it certainly won’t. The 18 Watt Quick Charge support helps you to charge up your phone in no time. It has a storage of 128GB that lets you store your files with ease.

 

The Realme 8 5G features an amazing camera combination of 48 MP (Primary Camera), 2 MP (B&W Portrait Lens), and 2 MP (4 cm Macro Lens). The 48 MP Nightscape camera records your nights clearly. The photography functions are Super Nightscape, Panoramic View, Expert, Timelapse, Portrait Mode, HDR, Ultra Macro, AI Scene Recognition, AI Beauty, Filters. The 16 MP front camera offers natural and personalized options, delivering fabulous selfies. The photography functions are Portrait Mode, Panoramic View, AI Beauty, HDR, Face-Recognition, Super Nightscape. It creates customized selfies with natural and charming effects, revealing the most attractive you. The camera setup of this smartphone ensures true clarity in your pictures. So, go ahead and purchase the Realme 8 5G online, right now!
